TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RowToFieldTransformer extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField
Public NotInheritable Class RowToFieldTransformer Inherits WebPartTransformer Implements IWebPartField
type RowToFieldTransformer = class inherit WebPartTransformer interface IWebPartField

Docs.summary: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the interface to a consumer expecting data through the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points. A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer requiring data from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class allows controls with these incompatible connection points to be connected.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object to connect a provider and consumer with incompatible connection points. The first section of the example shows a Web Parts control that serves as a provider. The provider class, named `RowProviderWebPart`, provides data through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface.
[!code-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/RowProviderWebPart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/RowProviderWebPart.vb#1)]
The second section of the example contains a Web Parts control that is a consumer of a Web Parts connection. The consumer class, named `FieldConsumerWebPart`, expects data from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
[!code-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/FieldConsumerWebPart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/FieldConsumerWebPart.vb#2)]
The third section of the example shows a page that contains the two controls and defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object for connecting the two controls.
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/CS/transformer3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_RowToFieldTransformer_Overview/VB/transformer3.aspx#3)]
The code example includes a user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. The source code for the user control comes from another topic. You can obtain the .ascx file for the user control from [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0), and it must be placed in the same folder as the .aspx page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Control CreateConfigurationControl() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateConfigurationControl () As Control

Docs.summary: Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a transformer in the zone.
Docs.returns: An ASP.NET control that configures a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically. A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` tag. A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a web page and the user is in the connect mode. When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.
The configuration control for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object allows a user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row to connect with the data field of the consumer. It is displayed in the connections zone. The user's configuration settings will be saved, and loaded on the next visit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FieldName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FieldName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the value to transform.
Docs.value: A containing the name of the field to transform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.FieldName%2A> property represents the data from the provider row that will be transformed for the consumer. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.FieldName%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToFieldTransformer FieldName="`*selectedField*`" />` tag, where *selectedField* contains the name of the field to transform.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two Web Parts controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.Transform%2A> method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> so it can be used by the consumer.
